issue.title: Arrow Java Library Build Error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6400](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6400). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow Java Library is not being built with both 'master' and 'maint-0.14.x ' branches.

Please see the attachments.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6400?focusedCommentId=16920039) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
What command are you trying to run?  What OS?  Is you computer locked down in some way?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6400?focusedCommentId=16920147) by Tanveer (tahmad):*
I am simply running "mvn install" in Java dir of Arrow in Singularity container.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6400?focusedCommentId=16920189) by Tanveer (tahmad):*
Solved this issue by adding "-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStorePassword=changeit"  to mvn install command. Thanks.
